mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.FREE_CMT_NO, A.FREE_NO, A.FREE_CMT_CONTENT, A.FREE_CMT_CREATE_DATE, A.FREE_CMT_MODIFY_DATE, A.FREE_CMT_IP, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORDER FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORDER ASC) AS ROW_NUM, FREE_CMT_NO, FREE_NO, FREE_CMT_CONTENT, FREE_CMT_CREATE_DATE, FREE_CMT_MODIFY_DATE, FREE_CMT_IP, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER FROM ANI_BRD_FREE_COMMENT WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNo}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
